short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension help you see your returns in Entropia Universe

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Open My Items on Entropia Universe website and from there you can open the extension by clicking on this extension logo at the top right of your screen.

Also you can stream your return on PEDs and see what items you have for sale.
